description: UIT-MUSIC API Endpoints - Complete API Reference for Frontend Integration

home.description: APIs for Home Page - Trending, Recommendations, Discovery

endpoints.name: Get Trending Songs
endpoints.description: Get trending songs for home page

endpoints.name: Get All Songs
endpoints.description: Get paginated list of songs with filters

endpoints.name: Increment Play Count
endpoints.description: Track song play and increment play counter

endpoints.name: Get Daily Mixes
endpoints.description: Get daily mix playlists (favorites, trending, discovery)

endpoints.name: Get Similar Songs
endpoints.description: Get songs similar to a specific song

endpoints.name: Get Album by ID
endpoints.description: Get album details with optional songs

endpoints.name: Get Albums by Label
endpoints.description: Get all albums from a specific record label

endpoints.name: Get All Genres
endpoints.description: Get paginated list of music genres

endpoints.name: Search
endpoints.description: Global search across songs, albums, artists, and playlists

endpoints.name: Get Home Summary
endpoints.description: Get home page summary (recently played, top songs, favorites)

endpoints.name: Get Favorite Count
endpoints.description: Get total count of favorite songs

endpoints.name: Get Favorite Song IDs
endpoints.description: Get array of favorite song IDs

endpoints.name: Track Song Play
endpoints.description: Track song play in listening history

subscriptions.description: APIs for Subscriptions Page - Plans, Payments, Transactions

endpoints.name: Get My Subscriptions
endpoints.description: Get subscription history for authenticated user

endpoints.name: Renew Subscription
endpoints.description: Renew a cancelled or expired subscription

endpoints.name: Get Payment Methods
endpoints.description: Get all available payment methods (Admin only)

endpoints.name: Create Transaction
endpoints.description: Create a new payment transaction and get QR code

endpoints.name: Get All Transactions
endpoints.description: Get paginated list of all transactions (Admin only)

endpoints.name: Refund Transaction
endpoints.description: Process a refund for a transaction (Admin only)

settings.description: APIs for Settings Page - Profile, Preferences, Devices

endpoints.name: Get User Preferences
endpoints.description: Get user preferences (audio quality, playback, notifications)

endpoints.name: Upsert User Preferences
endpoints.description: Create or update user preferences in one operation

endpoints.name: Delete User Preferences
endpoints.description: Delete user preferences and reset to defaults

endpoints.name: Get User Devices
endpoints.description: Get all devices registered to user

endpoints.name: Revoke Device
endpoints.description: Revoke access for a specific device

endpoints.name: Revoke All Devices
endpoints.description: Revoke all devices except current one

endpoints.name: Get Followers Count
endpoints.description: Get followers count for artist or label

endpoints.name: Get Record Labels
endpoints.description: Get paginated list of record labels

endpoints.name: Get Record Label by User ID
endpoints.description: Get record label by user ID

queryParams.type: string (optional, values: 'Subscription Expiry', 'New Release', 'System Update', 'Copyright Notice')

endpoints.name: Get User Rating
endpoints.description: Get user's rating for a song

endpoints.name: Generate Presigned URL
endpoints.description: Generate presigned URL for file upload to S3

endpoints.name: Generate Image Upload URL
endpoints.description: Generate presigned URL for image upload

endpoints.name: Presign Master Asset
endpoints.description: Generate presigned URL for master asset

endpoints.name: Get My Copyright Report by ID
endpoints.description: Get specific copyright report by user

endpoints.name: Get Copyright Report by ID
endpoints.description: Get copyright report by ID (Admin only)

notes.authentication: Most endpoints require Bearer token in Authorization header: 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'
notes.baseURL: Change baseURL in this file to match your API server URL
notes.pathParams: Replace :paramName with actual values in the path (e.g., /songs/123)
notes.queryParams: Append query parameters to URL with ?key=value&key2=value2
notes.bodyParams: Send in request body as JSON for POST/PUT/PATCH requests
notes.responseFormat: All responses follow standard format with data/error structure
notes.pagination: Most list endpoints support pagination with 'page' and 'limit' query parameters
notes.filtering: Many endpoints support filtering via query parameters
notes.sorting: List endpoints often support 'sort' and 'order' query parameters
